con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sch6="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:sch5="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:sch4="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1" xmlns:sch3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1" xmlns:sch2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:sch1="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:sch0="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentauthorization:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:edb="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:aut="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentauthorization:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"/> <xs:element name="PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest" type="tns:PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Create a Authorization agreement in PWH</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentAuthorizationCreateResponse" type="tns:PaymentAuthorizationCreateResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Simple baseResponseType for the PaymentAuthorizationCreate request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateRequest" type="tns:PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Create a Authorization agreement in PWH</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateResponse" type="tns:PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Simple baseResponseType for the PaymentAuthorizationCreate request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAuthorizationCreateRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="cpsAuthorizationMessage" type="aut:CPSPaymentAuthorizationCreateMessage"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAuthorizationCreateResponse"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="cpsAuthorizationMessage" type="aut:CPSPaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateMessage"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAuthorizationAccountCreateResponse"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:simpleType name="ISODate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ISODateTime"> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max15NumericText"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{1,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BaseOneRate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="10"/> <xs:totalDigits value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="5"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="0"/> <xs:totalDigits value="12"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeBearerTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DEBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CRED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SHAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>In a credit transfer context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the debtor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the creditor. In a direct debit context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SLEV"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges are to be applied following the rules agreed in the service level and/or scheme.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PriorityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="HIGH"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is high.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NORM"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is normal.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"/> <xs:minLength value="8"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CountryCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2,2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SEPA"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SEPA</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FOREIGN_ACCOUNT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>FOREIGN_ACCOUNT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_EINVOICE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_EINVOICE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\+[0-9]{1,3}-[0-9()+\-]{1,30}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max10Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max16Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max34Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="34"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AnyBICIdentifier"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"/> <xs:minLength value="8"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max30Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max35Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="35"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max40Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max50Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max70Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="70"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max128Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="128"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max140Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="140"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max170Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="170"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max105Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="105"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max254Text"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\S.*\S|\S"/> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="254"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OriginalFormatCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CLIENT_GENERATED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a client.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ISO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from an ISO file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a NDR file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TELEPAY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a Telepay file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PAYMUL"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a Paymul file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SALARY_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a salary file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PAYMENT_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a payment list file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PREPAID_LIST"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generated from a prepaid list file</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unknown origin (migrated?)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-complex-types:v1" xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"/> <xs:complexType name="PartyIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: Set of elements used to identify a person or an organisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="faxNumber" type="st:PhoneNumber"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PostalAddress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>PAYS can do validations against the country code (depending on which party/agent type it is). All other fields is information only, and is sent to Payment Engine without any form of validation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="addressType" type="tns:AddressTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO "Identifies the nature of the postal address. Values: ADDR, PBOX, HOME, BIZZ, MLTO, DLVY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="department" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="subDepartment" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetName" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a street or thoroughfare."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="buildingNumber" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Number that identifies the position of a building on a street."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="postCode" type="st:Max16Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="townName" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="countrySubDivision" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="country" type="st:CountryCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Nation with its own government."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="7" minOccurs="0" name="addressLine" type="st:Max70Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, presented in free format text."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="ADDR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the complete postal address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PBOX"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is a postal office (PO) box.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOME"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the home address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BIZZ"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the business address.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MLTO"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which mail is sent.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DLVY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Address is the address to which delivery is to take place.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="FinancialInstitutionIdentification"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Set of elements used to uniquely and unambiguously identify a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bic" type="st:BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Code allocated to a financial institution by the ISO 9362 Registration Authority as described in ISO 9362; Banking - Banking telecommunication messages - Business identifier code (BIC)."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="nationalId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Depending on validations against PBD, will be mapped against the following ISO fields: 1: MemberIdentification - "Identification of a member of a clearing system" 2: Other - ""Unique identification of an agent, as assigned by an institution, using an identification scheme Regarding 1, PAYS will also add a ClearingSystemIdentification to uniquely identify the agent within the correct clearing system of that country. This ID can be found in ISO's ExternalCodeList overview.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Name by which an agent is known and which is usually used to identify that agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postalAddress" type="tns:PostalAddress"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExchangeRate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="exchangeRate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element default="SPOT" minOccurs="0" name="rateType" type="tns:ExchangeRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type used to complete the currency exchange." Values: SPOT, SALE, AGRD</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="contractIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique and unambiguous reference to the foreign exchange contract agreed between the initiating party/creditor and the debtor agent."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExchangeRateTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SPOT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SALE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the market rate at the time of the sale.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGRD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange rate applied is the rate agreed between the parties.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentIdentification"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="messageIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Point to point reference, as assigned by the instructing party, and sent to the next party in the chain to unambiguously identify the message." Usage: The instructing party has to make sure that MessageIdentification is unique per instructed party for a pre-agreed period.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="endToEndIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unumbiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain. " NB! endToendIdentification will remain unchanged in updates (as opposed to other ids return in create response. This field is therefore a good canditate to follow a payment in audit trail.)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AmountTypeChoice"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="instructedAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="equivalentAmount" type="tns:EquivalentAmount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, expressed in the currency of the debtor's account, and the currency in which the amount is to be moved.""</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="EquivalentAmount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="tns:Amount"/> <xs:element name="currencyOfTransfer" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the currency of the to be transferred amount, which is different from the currency of the debtor's account."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Account"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the details to identify an account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Account identifier; IBAN or other generic identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification of the currency in which the account is held.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Amount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="amount" type="st:Amount_SimpleType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="currency" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentAmounts"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains information regarding debit and credit amount along with counter values and conversionRate info. At least one of debitCounterValue and creditCounterValue is always set. This information is always recalculated in Read/Search</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="debitAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the debtor account currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="creditAmount" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the transfer currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="debitCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be deducted from the debtor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="creditCounterValue" type="tns:Amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount to be transferred to the creditor, expressed in the base currency.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="conversionRateInfo" type="tns:ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate used to convert between the debit and credit amount.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ConversionRateInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="rate" type="st:BaseOneRate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the type of rate used when performing exchange rate conversion." Values: NONE, AGREED_RATE, SELL_RATE, BUY_RATE, MID_RATE, CROSS_RATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="unitNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Describes the unit number. Possible values: 1 and 100.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="100"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ConversionRateTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="NONE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>No conversion has been done.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AGREED_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using an agreed rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SELL_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a sell rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BUY_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a buy rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MID_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a mid rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CROSS_RATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Conversion has been done using a cross rate.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RegulatoryReporting"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information needed due to regulatory and statutory requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="st:Max10Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Specifies the nature, purpose, and reason for the transaction to be reported for regulatory and statutory requirements in a coded form. " A PBD-service can provide these codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="information" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Additional details that cater for specific domestic regulatory requirements.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="InstructionForCreditorAgent"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="code" type="tns:InstructionForCreditorAgentCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Coded information related to the processing of the payment instruction, provided by the initiating party, and intended for the creditor's agent." Values: CHQB, HOLD, PHOB, TELB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="instructionInformation" type="st:Max140Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ISO: "Further information complementing the coded instruction or instruction to the creditor's agent that is bilaterally agreed or specific to a user community."</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="InstructionForCreditorAgentCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHQB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(Ultimate) creditor must be paid by cheque.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HOLD"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount of money must be held for the (ultimate) creditor, who will call. Pay on identification.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PHOB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by phone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TELB"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Please advise/contact (ultimate) creditor/claimant by the most efficient means of telecommunication.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="Approval"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="dateOfApproval" type="st:ISODate"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Approver"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="approverFirstName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="approverLastName" type="st:Max35Text"/> <xs:element name="identification" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:authorization:v1" xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"/> <xs:simpleType name="AccountType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CoreAccount=Reskontro konto TaxAccount=Skattetrekkskonto BuildingLendingAccount=Byggelånskonto LendingAccount=Utlånskonto CurrencyCoreFD=Valuta Reskontro FD Valuta CurrencyFelix= Valutakonto in Felix (DNB) NordPayFelix=Norpaykonto in Felix (DNB) MTForeign=MT konto Utland NordicLink=Nordic Link konto ForeignBankCoreAccount=Fremmed bank Reskontrokonto ForeignBankCurrencyAccount=Fremmed bank Valutakonto ManuallyAddedCurrencyAccount=Man. opplagt egen valutakonto InterimAccount=InterimKonto ForeignAccountLoanAccount=Fremmed bank Utlånskonto ForeignBankTaxAccount=Fremmed skattetrekkskonto</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CoreAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="TaxAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="BuildingLendingAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="LendingAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="CurrencyCoreFD"/> <xs:enumeration value="CurrencyFelix"/> <xs:enumeration value="NordPayFelix"/> <xs:enumeration value="MTForeign"/> <xs:enumeration value="NordicLink"/> <xs:enumeration value="ForeignBankCoreAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="ForeignBankCurrencyAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="ManuallyAddedCurrencyAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="InterimAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="ForeignAccountLoanAccount"/> <xs:enumeration value="ForeignBankTaxAccount"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UserAccountRole"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="View"/> <xs:enumeration value="Register"/> <xs:enumeration value="Appprove"/> <xs:enumeration value="Salary"/> <xs:enumeration value="Transfer"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UserRole"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Confidential"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="UserAccount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accountNumber" type="st:Max34Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The account number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="bic" type="st:AnyBICIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Swift adress in case of foreign accounts</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currencyCode" type="st:ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The currency of the account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="accountType" type="tns:AccountType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="role" type="tns:UserAccountRole"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The set of roles the user has on the account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="approvalLimit" type="st:Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Max amount to approve. This is an amount without 'øre'. 10 = 10 (kr if currency = NOK)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="registerLimit" type="st:Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Max amount to register. This is an amount without 'øre'. 10 = 10 (kr if currency = NOK)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="numberOfVerifiers" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of distinct verifiers batch and online payments need in order to reach status readyForApproval for this account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="numberOfApprovers" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of distinct approvers batch and online payments need in order to reach status readyForDueDate for this account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AgreementData"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="agreementId" type="st:Max30Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The agreementId</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bankId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The bank id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="customerID" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The regbiz no (foretaksnummer) for the customer of the agreement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="productID" type="st:Max30Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The productid of the agreement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CPSUserAuthorizationData"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="agreementData" type="tns:AgreementData"/> <xs:element name="userId" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The userId</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="sessionID" type="st:Max30Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The sessionID, used to check for valid session. If session doesn't match, a checkSession request must be issued towards CPS to check for session.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="firstName" type="st:Max30Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Firstname of user.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lastName" type="st:Max50Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Lastname of user.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="socialSecurityNumber" type="st:Max35Text"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The social security number for the customer of the agreement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userAccount" type="tns:UserAccount"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userRole" type="tns:UserRole"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="AccountAccessType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Access to an account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="VIEW"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREDIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="DEBIT"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREDIT_AND_DEBIT"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="AgreementAccount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accountNumber" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The account number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="swiftAdress" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Swift adress in case of foreign accounts</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currencyCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The currency of the account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="accountType" type="tns:AccountType"/> <xs:element name="access" type="tns:AccountAccessType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Access to an account for the agreement.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CPSAccountAthorizationData"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="agreementData"
